subject: Re: Dressed for Sale New Pricing for Quote Platform
preview: @heath I just had a look on this one. It seems to be working fine on my end. Did she call you earlier?

full_threads.body: @heath I just had a look on this one. It seems to be working fine on my end. Did she call you earlier?

Hi Joel and Heath

I'm just adding some new quotes to the system and can't see a change in the pricing. I might be doing something wrong. Would one of you mind giving me a call back to run through this with me.

Thanks.



Keryn Rogers

Business Manager

T 08 8333 3443 | 7 Myer Court, Beverley SA 5009

www.dressedforsale.com.au

Thanks Joel ☺

Logged 30mins to Harvest for (Dressed for Sale Australia)

Hi Dan,

Yes, that’s correct. No current quotes will be affected. 

Only new ones from Thursday onwards. 

But if you try and add a new inventory on the pending quotes (Quotes created before Feb 4), it will use the new pricing.

Hi Joel

Thank you for your assistance with this.

Can you pls confirm that this will NOT affect any live quotes that were done (and still pending) before these changes were made? The intention is for this new pricing to only be in quotes from this morning onwards. Any previous live quotes should remain exactly as they were with the old pricing.

Regards

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Keryn,

Confirming we have updated the pricing for the inventory.
We have added a few new Items: 
- Buffet
- Dining Table
- Armchair/s (Outdoor)

Hi Guys



Just an update on this..



Pricing will be active by Thursday morning.

Please ask the Stylist's NOT to use the quote platform after 7pm Wednesday night for Heaths team to work on the pricing changes over night.



Heath as per our conversation some of the following may already be in place but would you mind implementing if not.

4 weeks hire, plus 2 free ( same as Advantage's platform).

Delivery fee will be left empty for entry given there will always be a variation between Adelaide and Melbourne and different job sizes.

Ongoing rental defaults to 1 week.

Delivery fee separate from furniture hire fee (client's view)



Any other questions please give me a call.



Thank you ☺









Keryn Rogers

Business Manager

M 0411 208 174| E keryn@dressedforsale.com.au

T 08 8333 3443 | 7 Myer Court, Beverley SA 5009

www.dressedforsale.com.au

[url=file:///linkedin.com/in/yourusernamehere]

Hello All Thank you Keryn, it will be important to get our new pricing implemented asap. Without knowing your platform in detail, do we not also need to address the default settings for :
  • Rental term and free weeks
  • Delivery fees
  • Ongoing rental (or maybe that's already correct if it reflect 100% of a weeks rental)
  • Other fees we are now getting rid of (if they appear)
  • How the quote presents to the client? On this point, we wish to separate out the rental from the delivery fee.
Regards Dan Dan Gerber Managing Director Advantage Property Styling Follow us on: M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611 Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019 http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and Joel


I've attached new pricing for the online quoting platform, this is to replace the existing pricing.


Can you please implement for us at your earliest convenience?


I'll give you a call in the morning to follow up and to answer any questions.


Thank you 😃




Keryn Rogers

Business Manager

M 0411 208 174| E keryn@dressedforsale.com.au

T 08 8333 3443 | 7 Myer Court, Beverley SA 5009

www.dressedforsale.com.au
